description: Everyone involved in schools "must do better" for the Isle of Man's children, the education minister says.
title: Isle of Man education review 'a catalyst for change'
title_page: Isle of Man education review 'a catalyst for change' - BBC News
maintext: Chris Robertshaw MHK said the current industrial action being taken by some teachers was "probably a measure of the depth of the hurt that was imparted upon the education service that's difficult to let go".
